titleStmt.title: Daniel W. Lindsey to John M. Palmer
CWG13952

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 10 ; 10 Feb - 16 March 1865

body.p:
350
March 11th 5
Maj Genl Jno M. Palmer
Comd'g Dept of Ky
Louisville Ky.
General.

I have the honor to inclose herein a petition signed by sundry citizens of Boyd county Ky, for a company for local protection. This petition was presented to his excellency Gov Bramlette by the Sheriff of said county who awaits a reply from you.

Very Respectfully
Your Obdt Servt
D W Lindsey
Adj Genl Ky
